title: Open Source Silicon
description:
Update on new advances in the area of open source silicon, including interesting new announcements.
Update on the status of various open source silicon projects;* System Verilog support in open source tools** System Verilog compliance test suite - https://github.com/SymbiFlow/sv-tests and https://symbiflow.github.io/sv-tests** New System Verilog formatter and linter - https://github.com/google/verible** New System Verilog parser - https://github.com/alainmarcel/Surelog* OpenRoadProject - https://theopenroadproject.org/* OpenRAM - https://github.com/VLSIDA/OpenRAM* Open Source PDKs
